String.string: "I'm no one...and I was just leaving."
Find the cave and use the truth needle on {@LinkCreature:181#2008}.
Find Shifting Map in Camp Commander's Chest.
Climb the ladder and destroy the wooden cage.
"I'll draw them off. When I doâ€”run!"
"Plenty of time for that later. I've got this."
"You might be right. One way to find out."
Go to Baaldaz Post and report to Dougal.
